channel.title: Add Postgres application_name connection property
channel.description:
It would be nice to specify `application_name` for Postgres data sources. They help to distinguish the source of the query on the database side.
It also might make sense to set `fallback_application_name=Redash` by default as well.
* https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/libpq-connect.html#LIBPQ-CONNECT-APPLICATION-NAME
